description: Front gardenT1	English Oak x 1 (Quercus robur) Suggested works:	- Lift over pavement by 3m- Cut back from building by 2m- Clean out crown- Remove any substantial dead wood- Reduce in any overlong branches back into the main crown to shapeT17	Hawthorn x 1 (Crataegus monogyna) Suggested works:	-Fell to ground levelFront garden left hand sideT16	Lime x 1	(Tilia spp)	Suggested works:- Lift over road and pavement by 3m- Reduce overlong branches back into the main crownLeft hand side of the villaT15	Sorbus spp x  Suggested works:- Lift to 3m- Cut back from building by 2mLeft hand side of villaT13	Uknown x 1	Suggested works:	- Lift to 2mT14	Uknown x 1	Suggested works:	- Reduce over long branches back into the main crownRear gardenT10	Lime x 1	(Tilia spp) Very large treeSuggested works:- Remove all epicormic growth- Thin crown by 25%T11	London Plane x1 (Platanus x hispanica) Very large tree. Suggested works:- Reduce back over long branches over hanging building back into the main crown- Cut back from building- Lift all round by 3mRear garden opposite T6T9	Japanese Maple x1 (Acer japonicum) Suggested works:- Light prune to shapeRear garden right hand sideT4	Acer spp x 1	Suggested works:	- Cut back over garden by 2mT5	False Acacia x 1 (Robinia pseudoacacia) Suggested works:- Cut back over garden by 2-3m- Remove substantial dead woodT6	Holm Oak (Evergreen) x1 (Quercus ilex)	Suggested works:- Cut back in line with the hedged part of the tree at the baseT7	Ash leaf Maple x1 (Acer negundo) Suggested works:	- Cut back and lift over pathT8	Acer spp x 1	Suggested works:	- Cut back and lift over pathRight hand side of villaT2	Lime x 1	(Tilia spp) Suggested works:	- Lift all round by 3m- Clean out crownT3	Laurel x 1 (Prunus spp) Suggested works:	- Cut back from building by 2m
